title: Commands:
footer: If you have any further questions, direct them to diggitydingdong#3084.

subCommands.name: invite
subCommands.description: Sends the invite link for the bot, so you can add it to your own server.

subCommands.name: start @Opponent
subCommands.description: Starts a game against the @Opponent. Note: @Opponent must be a mention (i.e. highlighted).

subCommands.name: stop
subCommands.description: Stops the current game of tic-tac-toe you're in.

subCommands.name: start @Opponent
subCommands.description: Starts a game against the @Opponent. Note: @Opponent must be a mention (i.e. highlighted).

subCommands.name: stop <game id>
subCommands.description: Stops the game with the id <game id> (required).
